item.title: Colophon
item.description: Website This website was built with the following technologies. R Markdown Specifically, the website is an R Markdown website For other great options from RStudio developers bookdown blogdown Slides were developed using the xamarin R package Hosting Hosting is provided through netlify. Simple instructions for getting setup can be found within Chapter 3.1 of the blogdown book/site.
